attributes.action: Tell America to stop trying to own the Internet!
attributes.additional_details:
America is proposing a new law that will effectively end net neutrality. They have proposed a system that allows service providers to regulate connection speeds for different websites, according to how much they are paid.

This ruling could destroy the internet as we know it and we MUST act as allies of America to oppose this idea with every opportunity! America does not own the internet, and we need to tell them that!
